items.title: Replace the Retiring Windows XP with Linux
items.excerpt: Article URL: https://www.linux.com/training-tutorials/replace-retiring-windows-xp-linux/ Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46577019 Points: 13 # Comments: 3
items.wireTitle: US executive directs agencies to draft living standards policy proposal
items.wireSummary: A US official has tasked federal departments with creating a comprehensive plan for improving the standard of living, as part of an initiative that includes replacing outdated operating systems like Windows XP.

items.title: I dumped Windows 11 for Linux, and you should too
items.excerpt: Article URL: https://www.notebookcheck.net/I-dumped-Windows-11-for-Linux-and-you-should-too.1190961.0.html Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46574707 Points: 278 # Comments: 273
items.wireTitle: User switches from Windows to Linux operating system
items.wireSummary: A user has transitioned their computing experience from the Microsoft Windows 11 OS to a variant of Unix-like systems known as Linux, according to an article on NotebookCheck.

items.title: Iran warns it will retaliate if US attacks as protesters defy crackdown
items.excerpt: Medics at two hospitals tell the BBC more than 100 bodies have been brought in over a two day period.
items.wireTitle: Iran warns of retaliation if US military action
items.wireSummary: In response to potential threats and protests against the crackdown in Iran, officials have stated they will respond with force. Reports indicate that medical facilities are experiencing an influx of casualties.
